product_overview: Employee Management System (EMS) is a comprehensive web-based platform designed to help HR administrators efficiently manage employee records, designations, and departments within an organization, ensuring streamlined workforce administration and data integrity.
core_goals: Enable administrators to perform CRUD operations on employees, designations, and departments.
Provide secure authentication with role-based access control to differentiate between administrators and standard users.
Offer a responsive and intuitive UI for efficient management tasks.
Maintain data validation and security through strict input validation and encrypted authentication.
Deliver a scalable architecture leveraging Angular with modern state management techniques for seamless user experience.
key_features: User Authentication with secure JWT token based login and logout capabilities.
Employee Management including listing with pagination, search, sorting, and full CRUD functionality with validation on inputs such as email uniqueness and phone number format.
Designation and Department Management providing CRUD operations to maintain master data.
Dashboard overview providing snapshot insights of employee data (planned enhancements for analytics in future versions).
Role-based access ensuring administrators have full control while standard users have limited read-only access to their profiles.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via secure email and password authentication.
Administrator accesses the dashboard to view employee overview and navigates to employee list.
Administrator adds, edits, or deletes employee records using validated forms with selections for designation and department.
Administrator manages master data by performing CRUD operations on designations and departments.
Standard users can login to view their profile with optional update request feature.
Users log out securely ending their session.
validation_criteria: Authentication must validate credentials and issue JWT tokens securely.
Employee forms require field validations including unique email and proper phone and pincode formats.
Soft or hard delete of employees must prompt confirmation dialogs.
Role-based permissions restrict access appropriately between administrators and standard users.
UI components respond correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with expected load times under 2 seconds.
All API requests are protected and validate tokens for secure data access.
Error handling provides clear feedback through notifications and modals.
Data encryption and password storage comply with bcrypt/Argon2 standards.
